Class Brick

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.bricks.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
IBrick, JBrick, LBrick, OBrick, SBrick, TBrick, ZBrick
public abstract class Brick extends Object
Abstract base class representing a brick in the game

A Brick defines:

  • An indentifier (id) for distinguishing brick types
  • A list of shape matrices representing the brick in different rotations

Concrete subclasses (e.g., IBrick, JBrick, LBrick) provides specific brick shapes used in gameplay

    • getShapeMatrix

      public List<int[][]> getShapeMatrix()
      Returns the list of shape matrices for this brick

      Each matrix represents the brick in a different rotation.

      Returns:
      a list of 2D integer arrays representing the brick's rotations
